Blessed Prognosticator

Omens of Resolution

Such portents assure the shooter that his bloody work will not be in vain.

+10% to melee defence from good omens
[HIDDEN] -1% Chance of Success For Enemy Agent Against this Agent (Received Every Level)

Omens of Valour

The pure of heart shall want not for courage, even in the face of death.

+5% to morale from good omens
[HIDDEN] -1% Chance of Success For Enemy Agent Against this Agent (Received Every Level)

Blessed Prognosticator

What was is and what will be. All of these things are as clear as a Spring morning.

+10% to chance of good omens from sacrifices
[HIDDEN] -1% Chance of Success For Enemy Agent Against this Agent (Received Every Level)

Strict

Strict

Rituals must be performed perfectly, down to the finest detail, if the desired results are to be obtained.

+5% to action cost for Ritual of Exaltation
+5% to favour of the gods from rituals in enemy settlements
[HIDDEN] -1% Chance of Success For Enemy Agent Against this Agent (Received Every Level)

The Allure of Battle

To live by your wits, to fight, to kill your enemies, to see defeat in their eyes at the end. It is the stuff of dreams for the true warrior.

+1 to horde growth

Doombringer

They'll know, they'll know that it is I that encompasses their doom!

+10% to action cost for Ritual of Exaltation
